{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3079379,"name":"AgentSmith451","username":"AgentSmith451","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/agentsmith451/{size}/231133_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-29T20:54:50.685Z","cooked":"

How many teams are using email to SMS/MMS for announcements or teamwide communications? We typically send out everything via email, and have been experimenting with email to text messages (email to phone number + carrier suffix). Is anyone using this successfully, or is there a free service we should look into that makes things more streamlined? The results have been functional, but sometimes spotty and clunky so far in testing.

Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":23,"updated_at":"2022-08-29T20:54:50.685Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":48,"reads":367,"readers_count":366,"score":328.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":414546,"topic_slug":"email-to-text-msg-announcements","display_username":"AgentSmith451","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31049,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mentor - Team 451 "The Cat Attack""},"post_url":"/t/email-to-text-msg-announcements/414546/1","custom_user_title":"Mentor - Team 451 "The Cat Attack"","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3079380,"name":"Aidan Mundy","username":"Aidan-Mundy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aidan-mundy/{size}/177044_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-29T21:03:14.531Z","cooked":"

Biggest downside of email to text is that the email address is carrier specific (sometimes even subsidiary specific). If you are adding phone numbers to your database manually, https://freecarrierlookup.com/ is the solution I would use to get the email address that should work for each number. I’m sure there is an API out there somewhere that does the same thing if you need an automated solution. There are many services that allow you to programmatically send text messages, though those usually cost money for use since they are sending real texts.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":23,"updated_at":"2022-08-29T21:03:14.531Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":365,"readers_count":364,"score":113.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":414546,"topic_slug":"email-to-text-msg-announcements","display_username":"Aidan Mundy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://freecarrierlookup.com/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Welcome to FreeCarrierLookup.com","clicks":7}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":30018,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5113A, 87A"},"post_url":"/t/email-to-text-msg-announcements/414546/2","custom_user_title":"5113A, 87A","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3079381,"name":"","username":"IanSzalai","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ianszalai/{size}/210636_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-29T21:03:17.298Z","cooked":"

Our team uses Remind, which has served us well. It can send an SMS or can use an app for push notifications. There’s a browser version of the app too, but I’m unsure about email.

Remind also has standard chat features which are nice if, for example, a student wasn’t making it to a meeting and needed to let a mentor or other students know.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":23,"updated_at":"2022-08-29T21:03:17.298Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":335,"readers_count":334,"score":127.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":414546,"topic_slug":"email-to-text-msg-announcements","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.remind.com/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Remind is the best education communication platform. A solution built for educators, administrators, students & parents in mind.","clicks":13}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":7}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49699,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3255A"},"post_url":"/t/email-to-text-msg-announcements/414546/3","custom_user_title":"3255A","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3079383,"name":"AgentSmith451","username":"AgentSmith451","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/agentsmith451/{size}/231133_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-29T21:17:26.252Z","cooked":"

Manually putting the carriers in for the smaller team size we have wouldn’t be too bad, one thing that could cause a snag would be if people switch carriers and don’t let us know. I tried sending one today to a known wrong carrier and neither I nor the recipient had any indication that it didn’t go through (no “could not deliver” email back).

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":23,"updated_at":"2022-08-29T21:17:26.252Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":282,"readers_count":281,"score":66.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":414546,"topic_slug":"email-to-text-msg-announcements","display_username":"AgentSmith451","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":30018,"username":"Aidan-Mundy","name":"Aidan Mundy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aidan-mundy/{size}/177044_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31049,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mentor - Team 451 "The Cat Attack""},"post_url":"/t/email-to-text-msg-announcements/414546/4","custom_user_title":"Mentor - Team 451 "The Cat Attack"","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3079384,"name":"AgentSmith451","username":"AgentSmith451","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/agentsmith451/{size}/231133_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-29T21:18:01.929Z","cooked":"

Remind sounds pretty neat, is it free for education purposes?

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":23,"updated_at":"2022-08-29T21:18:16.017Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":261,"readers_count":260,"score":62.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":414546,"topic_slug":"email-to-text-msg-announcements","display_username":"AgentSmith451","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":49699,"username":"IanSzalai","name":"","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ianszalai/{size}/210636_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31049,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mentor - Team 451 "The Cat Attack""},"post_url":"/t/email-to-text-msg-announcements/414546/5","custom_user_title":"Mentor - Team 451 "The Cat Attack"","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3079385,"name":"Aidan Mundy","username":"Aidan-Mundy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aidan-mundy/{size}/177044_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-29T21:25:45.096Z","cooked":"

Hmm, if this is true for all carriers, the nuclear option may solve it: Just send an email to every known carrier for every phone number you have .

Separately, another way to find the correct email is to have them send a text message to an email address of your choice. At least on android, you can set the recipient of a text to an email address, and the email will come from the correct SMS gateway address for the sender.

Our team uses Slack for communication with students, mentors and parents. We also have the Pro Version since its offered free for 501(c)3 organizations, if you have one.
Between that, a team Google Drive and Google Calendar, we cover all of our various communications for our team. Texting and phone calls are now informal and secondary.

One advantage of SMS is that it will work for students with cell phones but no data plan (which is often the case I find for parents funding their kids’ phones. The wifi option usually doesn’t work at events).

I’m pretty sure everything I’ve described is free for everyone, but I know they do have paid tiers and I don’t manage anything related to it so I’m not sure.

We have the opposite problem. Somehow our school buildings are cell phone deserts, but all students can access the schools’ WiFi. So texting would be bad but Slack is great.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":23,"updated_at":"2022-08-30T01:52:03.968Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":181,"readers_count":180,"score":66.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":414546,"topic_slug":"email-to-text-msg-announcements","display_username":"Paul Rensing","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":22221,"username":"nuclearnerd","name":"Brendan Simons, 5406","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nuclearnerd/{size}/7324_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25118,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 2877 LigerBots Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/email-to-text-msg-announcements/414546/10","custom_user_title":"FRC 2877 LigerBots Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3079464,"name":"waialua3:59","username":"waialua359","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/waialua359/{size}/676_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-30T02:06:57.245Z","cooked":"

The problem we encountered over recent years, was text messaging became too messy. And it was hard to remember who said what to who. Its great for messaging, but not for our team when it comes to formal communication.
All of our students who have cell phones have unlimited data plans. Not sure if its a US thing or how plans are sold in other countries.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":23,"updated_at":"2022-08-30T02:06:57.245Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":14,"reads":169,"readers_count":168,"score":103.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":414546,"topic_slug":"email-to-text-msg-announcements","display_username":"waialua3:59","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":22221,"username":"nuclearnerd","name":"Brendan Simons, 5406","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nuclearnerd/{size}/7324_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":2254,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/email-to-text-msg-announcements/414546/11","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3079470,"name":"kylelanman","username":"kylelanman","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kylelanman/{size}/3427_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-30T03:39:05.061Z","cooked":"

We integrated sms/email alerts with our team forum through our hour tracking system using CloudMainIn.

CloudMailIn lets you create an email address that when a message is sent to it the email will be posted to a webhook. Our webhook is part of our Django based hours system.

The forum has a user with the CloudMailIn email set as it email. That user is subscribed to our Alerts Sub forum. Anytime a post is made, by a mentor, in that sub forum the Django webhook is called through CloudMainIn.

Any student that is in the hours system can send an sms to a special email address that also goes through CloudMailIn to another webhook. If their txt contains the correct text and their name then it will associate the sender’s email (carrier sms email or standard email) with their account in the hours system. They can also send the keyword hours to receive and hours total or unsubscribe at anytime to stop receiving alerts.

When the alerts webhook is called it iterates through all the users and sends an email to what ever email is associated with them with the alert from the forum.

It took a bit to get it right and working for all carriers as some send the message as an sms, mms, and/or attachment vs body of email but once I developed robust handling of incoming emails for all carriers it has been a completely self service system where students and mentors can enroll and unenroll easily as they choose.

I can share the project if people are interested but I’d need to scrub out SMTP passwords, DJango cert etc before linking to the github.

Discord has been great for team communications. Free to use w/ no fees besides internet, voice calls for meetings and ways to notify everyone for announcements.

Aidan-Mundy:

I’m sure there is an API out there somewhere that does the same thing if you need an automated solution.

Twilio is the 10,000 pound gorilla in the room. I’m sure there are others, too.

You can also send messages through Twilio directly with a little bit of scripting or integration.

It’s not free, but more robust than something like Remind.

Our school policy essentially forces us to use Remind.

It’s pretty good at what it does, short, quick reminders. It also does individual conversations as well

It also retains messages so if anything happens, the school can look through them

We use the email to text option. Our district requires communication to come from our school e-mail. We have the kids fill our a Google Doc with their contact info, parents info, and their cell carrier (this is via a pull down so the spelling etc. is consistent and correct). I then import it into Excel and make a formula that converts it to the e-mail. Concatenate the cell number cell with the carrier cell and voila, import into Outlook contacts and I’m good to go. I then save the group as RC Students Text, I also have a group for mentors, parents e-mail and students e-mail.
